title: Tech Hiem
description: A modern full-stack e-commerce platform allowing users to browse products, manage carts, and checkout securely. Features role-based access, order tracking, and a responsive UI.

details.overview: Tech Hiem is a comprehensive e-commerce platform with secure authentication and role-based access. Users can browse products, manage carts, and complete purchases seamlessly, while admins have full control over product and order management.
features: Role-based access: Admin and customer dashboards
Responsive UI for mobile and desktop
State management with Zustand for efficient UI updates
Integration with Firebase backend and database
challenges: Implementing real-time updates for inventory and orders
Ensuring secure authentication and data privacy
Creating a responsive and user-friendly interface across devices
details.results: Delivered a robust, scalable e-commerce solution with improved user engagement and streamlined admin operations.

title: Football Barber Club
description: A full-stack barber appointment and club management system for handling bookings, staff schedules, and client management with smooth animations.

details.overview: Football Barber Club is a complete appointment and club management system, enabling users to book services, view schedules, and manage clients efficiently, with smooth animations enhancing the user experience.
features: Admin dashboard for staff and client management
State management with Zustand for dynamic updates
challenges: Integrating smooth animations without performance lag
Designing intuitive dashboards for admins and users
details.results: Improved appointment management efficiency and enhanced client satisfaction through a modern, interactive interface.

title: Calendar System Management
description: A full-stack calendar and scheduling system allowing users to manage events, collaborate with teams, and integrate with external APIs with real-time notifications.

details.overview: Calendar System Management enables teams to schedule events, manage calendars, and receive real-time notifications. It integrates external APIs and offers advanced filtering and collaboration tools.
features: Real-time notifications for updates and reminders
Integration with Nylas API for email and calendar syncing
Robust database management with Prisma ORM
challenges: Integrating multiple APIs for seamless functionality
Creating an intuitive interface for complex schedules
details.results: Enhanced team coordination and scheduling efficiency through a highly interactive, real-time calendar system.

title: EFood
description: A full-stack food delivery mobile app built with React Native and Expo, including menus, cart management, and admin dashboard for restaurants.

details.overview: EFood allows users to browse restaurant menus, add items to cart, and place orders via a mobile app. Restaurant admins can manage menu items and track orders efficiently.
features: Mobile-first design with React Native and Expo
User authentication and data storage with Firebase
challenges: Optimizing mobile performance for smooth UX
Implementing scalable backend structure with Firebase
details.results: Delivered a seamless food delivery experience, improving order accuracy and user satisfaction.

title: Saya Farmuda
description: A frontend-focused Islamic Hadith project, presenting authentic Hadiths of Prophet Muhammad (PBUH) with a clean UI, easy navigation, and user favorites.

details.overview: Saya Farmuda is designed to educate and provide easy access to authentic Hadiths of Prophet Muhammad (PBUH). The project emphasizes clean, readable UI, user-friendly search, and favorites management.
features: Organized Hadiths by category and source
Add Hadiths to favorites for quick reference
Performance optimization for fast load times
challenges: Displaying a large volume of Hadiths efficiently
Implementing smooth search and filter features
Designing a readable and user-friendly interface
details.results: A reliable, educational, and user-friendly Hadith platform, promoting Islamic knowledge and accessibility for users.
